{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "DevOps Engineer",
  "description": "SpringRock Group is a privately held energy company with main focus in Oil and Gas and Power sectors of the energy domain. We straddle both aisles of the Oil and Gas industry as E&amp;P Operator and Oilfield Service provider.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: DevOps Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Description


	We are seeking a skilled DevOps Engineer to drive the design, automation, and management of our infrastructure and deployment processes.
	his role focuses on improving collaboration between development and operations teams while ensuring continuous testing, scalability, and 24/7 platform availability.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and manage infrastructure and deployment tools
	Implement CI/CD pipelines and automation workflows
	Integrate open-source technologies to support business goals
	Manage source control, branching, and release strategies
	Configure and maintain databases (MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra)
	Develop automation scripts using Python, Bash, or Perl
	Build and support microservices and internal tools
	Ensure system scalability, performance, and uptime
	Collaborate with project managers and technical teams to deliver projects successfully


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Computer Science or related field
	4&ndash;5 years of software engineering experience (minimum 2 years in DevOps)
	Strong skills in Python, Java, and JavaScript frameworks
	Experience with Agile and Scrum methodologies
	Proficiency with Git and command-line tools
	Solid understanding of operating systems and infrastructure


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;Izabelle@5cee.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

DevOps Engineer Job at SpringRock Group




        
    

        
        SpringRock Group is a privately held energy company with main focus in Oil and Gas and Power sectors of the energy domain. We straddle both aisles of the Oil and Gas industry as E&P Operator and Oilfield Service provider.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: DevOps Engineer

Job Location: Lagos

Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled DevOps Engineer to drive the design, automation, and management of our infrastructure and deployment processes.
	his role focuses on improving collaboration between development and operations teams while ensuring continuous testing, scalability, and 24/7 platform availability.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and manage infrastructure and deployment tools
	Implement CI/CD pipelines and automation workflows
	Integrate open-source technologies to support business goals
	Manage source control, branching, and release strategies
	Configure and maintain databases (MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, Cassandra)
	Develop automation scripts using Python, Bash, or Perl
	Build and support microservices and internal tools
	Ensure system scalability, performance, and uptime
	Collaborate with project managers and technical teams to deliver projects successfully


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
	4–5 years of software engineering experience (minimum 2 years in DevOps)
	Strong skills in Python, Java, and JavaScript frameworks
	Experience with Agile and Scrum methodologies
	Proficiency with Git and command-line tools
	Solid understanding of operating systems and infrastructure


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Izabelle@5cee.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Representative",
  "description": "Grayworth Frontier International Limited is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Selling to and conversing with customer to determine destination,travel dates, financial considerations, and accommodations required; computing cost of travel; booking transportation and hotel reservations; planning, describing, arranging, and selling itinerary travelpackages and promotional travel incentives
	Support the mission, vision, and strategic plan of Grayworth
	Build relationships to grow international student enrollment, Tourist, Work and Relocation Packages
	Manage clientportfolios and process admission,visaapplications and advise applicants of program options andrequirements
	Process clientfiles as domiclied in his/her custody, conduct credential eligibility evaluations.
	Promptly and courteously, respond to phone calls, emails and other requests from team members and clients
	Create and Promote approved Social media contents acroos social medial channels
	Cordinate all meetings as requested / required for team building.
	Collaborate with co-workers regarding new recruitment strategies, make suggestions on new strategies to increase marketing opportunities for clients acquisitionthereby ensuring high team performances in sales
	Process immigration documents in compliance with Homeland Security Regulations
	Stay up-to-date on government/legislative changes pertaining to international higher education
	Utilize recruitment tools such as social media platforms, personal contacts,fairs, presentations, etc.
	Submit the report offiles processed on a weekly, monthly, quarterly, half yearly and annually.
	Assist in development and execution of therecruitment plan and the international orientations
	Collaborate with other departments to assist in recruitment and enrollment efforts
	Work with teamand the management on collaborative projects
	Engage in dispute ressolutions to satisfy aggrieved customers
	Attend to other duties as requested by the Director
	Attend unscheduled meetings, marketing campaigns and other event as requested by the company even on weekends
	Traveling locally, regionally, nationally and overseas, if needed.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / NCE / OND qualification with 0-5 years of work experience.


Salary
N50,000 - N70,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;grayworthassociateltd@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Customer Service Representative Job at Grayworth Frontier International Limited




        
    

        
        Grayworth Frontier International Limited is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Selling to and conversing with customer to determine destination,travel dates, financial considerations, and accommodations required; computing cost of travel; booking transportation and hotel reservations; planning, describing, arranging, and selling itinerary travelpackages and promotional travel incentives
	Support the mission, vision, and strategic plan of Grayworth
	Build relationships to grow international student enrollment, Tourist, Work and Relocation Packages
	Manage clientportfolios and process admission,visaapplications and advise applicants of program options andrequirements
	Process clientfiles as domiclied in his/her custody, conduct credential eligibility evaluations.
	Promptly and courteously, respond to phone calls, emails and other requests from team members and clients
	Create and Promote approved Social media contents acroos social medial channels
	Cordinate all meetings as requested / required for team building.
	Collaborate with co-workers regarding new recruitment strategies, make suggestions on new strategies to increase marketing opportunities for clients acquisitionthereby ensuring high team performances in sales
	Process immigration documents in compliance with Homeland Security Regulations
	Stay up-to-date on government/legislative changes pertaining to international higher education
	Utilize recruitment tools such as social media platforms, personal contacts,fairs, presentations, etc.
	Submit the report offiles processed on a weekly, monthly, quarterly, half yearly and annually.
	Assist in development and execution of therecruitment plan and the international orientations
	Collaborate with other departments to assist in recruitment and enrollment efforts
	Work with teamand the management on collaborative projects
	Engage in dispute ressolutions to satisfy aggrieved customers
	Attend to other duties as requested by the Director
	Attend unscheduled meetings, marketing campaigns and other event as requested by the company even on weekends
	Traveling locally, regionally, nationally and overseas, if needed.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / NCE / OND qualification with 0-5 years of work experience.


Salary
N50,000 - N70,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: grayworthassociateltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Warehouse Assistant",
  "description": "Stellar International Company Limited&nbsp;is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. Stellar International Co. Ltd has three businesses, namely Recycling Ant, Ant Express and Antshop Online. Recycling Ant is a company committed to environmental protection in Nigeria. We have eight transit warehouses all over the country. They are used to recover various types of renewable resources, reduce environmental pollution, and promote the industrial development of Nigeria. Recycling Ant has opened a franchise model in Lagos. If you are interested in becoming our partner, please don&#39;t hesitate to contact us!

Ant Express has an advanced logistics system and can provide customers with professional services. Real-time control of the latest status in each transportation process of items, and excellent delivery, transit and transportation of items. With the combination of manpower and technology, the goods are guaranteed to be in good condition and delivered in time

Antshop Online is an E-Commerce and online Shopping destination.We pride ourselves in having everything you could possibly need for life and living at the best prices than anywhere else. Our access to Original Equipment Manufacturers and premium sellers gives us a wide range of products at very low prices. Some of our popular categories include electronics, mobile phones, computers, fashion, beauty products, home and kitchen, Building and construction materials and a whole lot more from premium brands.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
We are looking for a hardworking and reliable Warehouse assistant to join our team in PH.


	The ideal candidate will be responsible counting of goodsduring loading and unloading.
	Responsible for managing inbound and outbound operations, ensuring efficient movement of goods,
	Assist the warehouse supervisor in carrying out all general warehouse duties to maintain smooth daily operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive, inspect, and record incoming goods (inbound).
	Prepare and dispatch outgoing goods (outbound).
	Ensure accurate inventory management and stock control.
	Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the warehouse at all times.
	Assist in loading and offloading of goods.
	Ensure all warehouse activities comply with company policies and safety standards.
	Support other operational tasks as assigned by the warehouse supervisor.


Basic Salary
N70,000.00 + 10,000 Performance bonus.+ 1500 daily transportation subsidy

Warehouse Assistant Job at Stellar International Company Limited




        
    

        
        
     

            
    

Stellar International Company Limited is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. Stellar International Co. Ltd has three businesses, namely Recycling Ant, Ant Express and Antshop Online. Recycling Ant is a company committed to environmental protection in Nigeria. We have eight transit warehouses all over the country. They are used to recover various types of renewable resources, reduce environmental pollution, and promote the industrial development of Nigeria. Recycling Ant has opened a franchise model in Lagos. If you are interested in becoming our partner, please don't hesitate to contact us!

Ant Express has an advanced logistics system and can provide customers with professional services. Real-time control of the latest status in each transportation process of items, and excellent delivery, transit and transportation of items. With the combination of manpower and technology, the goods are guaranteed to be in good condition and delivered in time

Antshop Online is an E-Commerce and online Shopping destination.We pride ourselves in having everything you could possibly need for life and living at the best prices than anywhere else. Our access to Original Equipment Manufacturers and premium sellers gives us a wide range of products at very low prices. Some of our popular categories include electronics, mobile phones, computers, fashion, beauty products, home and kitchen, Building and construction materials and a whole lot more from premium brands.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Assistant

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
We are looking for a hardworking and reliable Warehouse assistant to join our team in PH.


	The ideal candidate will be responsible counting of goodsduring loading and unloading.
	Responsible for managing inbound and outbound operations, ensuring efficient movement of goods,
	Assist the warehouse supervisor in carrying out all general warehouse duties to maintain smooth daily operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive, inspect, and record incoming goods (inbound).
	Prepare and dispatch outgoing goods (outbound).
	Ensure accurate inventory management and stock control.
	Maintain cleanliness and orderliness of the warehouse at all times.
	Assist in loading and offloading of goods.
	Ensure all warehouse activities comply with company policies and safety standards.
	Support other operational tasks as assigned by the warehouse supervisor.


Basic Salary
N70,000.00 + 10,000 Performance bonus.+ 1500 daily transportation subsidy

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com cc: isreal@hengxingcompany.com using “Warehouse Assistant "and Location" as the subject of the

title: Recruitment Manager Job at RSIN Group
content:
RSIN was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, Fujian Province. We mainly conduct business in Nigeria and other western African countries. Over the past 20 years of development, we have become a multinational corporation with diversified industrial clusters of iron and steel, textile, fiber chemical and lead-acid battery manufacturing based on the construction of circular economy industrial park.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Recruitment Manager

Job Location: Aba, Abia
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Strategy & Planning: Develop and implement recruitment plans, align with company goals, and forecast staffing needs.
	Sourcing & Attraction: Post jobs, use social media, attend career fairs, and build talent pipelines.
	Screening & Selection: Review resumes, conduct interviews (including with hiring managers), and oversee selection.
	Offer & Negotiation: Extend offers, negotiate salaries, benefits, and contracts. Team Leadership: Manage, train, and mentor a team of recruiters and sourcers.
	Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with hiring managers to define roles and interview processes.
	Process Improvement: Create and recommend new interviewing techniques and track recruitment metrics.
	Compliance & Onboarding: Ensure adherence to employment laws and manage the onboarding process for new hires.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: stellarinternationalhr@gmail.com and copy to: isreal@hengxingcompany.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
